Package rj.tools.jcsc.plugins.intellij

Interface Summary
IntellijJCSC JCSC / IntelliJ plugin
SourceLineSelector Select specific line in current active source code window
 

Class Summary
IntellijJCSCImpl Implementation for the JCSC / IntelliJ plugin
JCSCAction JCSC parse action -- triggers parsing on current selected file
JCSCOptions Options for the JCSC plugin
JCSCResultPanel Results panel of the JCSC run
OptionsPanel Panel displaying the current options for modifications
OverviewPanel Panel providing some overview statistics from the parsing
